title: Virginians Refuse to Turn in Confederate License Plates in Spite of Governor’s Order | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
http://www.dcclothesline.com
Following the shooting in Charleston, South Carolina earlier this year, people lost their minds over the Confederate flag. The emblem, which represented states’ rights and Southern heritage, the last bastion of freedom in America, was attacked and maligned. Even landmarks … Continue reading →
